item.description:
f you're a fan of Steely Dan, you'll love No Static, a terrific Steely Dan cover band. They're at Ryles on the 26th, so let's Meetup for a night of great music and dancing. Several other meetup groups will also be attending.

Not familiar with No Static? You can check out a few of their Steely Dan covers on their website.

The show starts at 9:00 and tickets are $12 at the door. Tickets are now available online.

It is essential to get tickets in advance as they WILL SELL OUT! I have some tickets together so you can contact me if interested otherwise you can buy tickets at: http://ryles.interticket.com/arrivalorder.php?eid=2723&aid=4&vid=4

Ryles also serves dinner. You can see their menu online if you're interested in dinner & a show. (The Mitch's Barbecue is quite good.)

http://www.nostaticband.com/

You can park in the S&S Deli parking lots as both S&S and Ryles are owned by the same family. The lot entrance is on Hampshire Street.

There's also a small municipal lot on Springfield St. See this map. You should be able to see the lot on Springfield as well as the S&S between Hampshire and Cambridge streets. Please check the signs in this lot as I don't remember how late the meters are active (although most of Cambridge is now 8 p.m.)

Of course, there are also metered street spaces in the area, but you'll need to be persistent and patient to nab them. Allow extra time to find a parking space if you're arriving later as you will definitely end up hunting. Again, check signs and the meters; I think these are also active until 8 p.m.

I am pretty easy to pick out in a crowd as I am 6' tall.

See you there!
item.name: No Static returns to Ryles
